name: You Against Me
description:
A simple game… You. Me. Claim, steal, lock, score, win!

You Against Me is a turn-based card game where players take turns trying to lock as many squares as they can by claiming and stealing numbers on the game board. It’s easy to learn and quick to play. The more you play, the more strategy you develop and the harder it is to put down.

Modes:
• Feeling Social? Play against a friend on the same device using Pass & Play Mode!
• Feeling Kind of Social? Play against a friend or random stranger Online through Game Center!
• Feeling Anti-social? Play against one of the two Computer difficulties!

Features:
• Customize your appearance to fit your mood with different themes
• Many achievements to achieve
• Online strength system
